LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.TicketAttribute.Name.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The name of the custom ticket attribute.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.TicketAttribute.Tooltip.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify whether there will be a tooltip on the element ( when hovering )

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.TicketAttribute.AttributeControlType.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose how to display your attribute values.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.TicketAttribute.TextBoxPlaceholder.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose if there will be a placeholder for the textbox input element.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.TicketAttribute.IsRequired.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: When an attribute is required, the customer must choose an appropriate attribute value before they can continue.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.TicketAttribute.IsAdminAttribute.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify whether this attribute is visible only to staff users.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.TicketAttribute.IsFilterable.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify whether the staff users would be able to filter with this attribute.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.TicketAttribute.DisplayOrder.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The ticket attribute display order. 1 represents the first item in the list.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.TicketAttribute.Values.Name.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The name of the custom ticket attribute value.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.TicketAttribute.Values.IsPreSelected.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether this attribute value is pre selected for the ticket.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.TicketAttribute.Values.DisplayOrder.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The display order of the attribute value. 1 represents the first item in attribute value list.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.TicketAttribute.Values.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the ticket attribute before you can add values for this ticket attribute page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.TicketAttributes.Stores.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the ticket attribute before you can limit it to stores.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.TicketDepartment.DisplayOrder.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The display order of the department. 1 represents the first item in the list.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.TicketDepartment.UseDefaultEmailAccount
LocaleResource.Value: Use default email account ( from plugin settings )

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.TicketDepartment.EmailAccountId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The email account from which the emails from this department will be send.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.TicketDepartment.Stores.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the ticket department before you can limit it to stores.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.TicketDepartment.Staff.SaveBeforeEdit
LocaleResource.Value: You need to save the ticket department before you can add staff.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.EnableCaptcha.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enables/Disables the captcha on the new ticket page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.ResponseDeadline.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The response deadline in working hours.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.ShowStaffSignature.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify whether the signature will be shown at the bottom of the ticket message. ( It is only for staff )

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.ShowDeadlineWorkingHoursAndWorkingDayOnNewTicketsPage
LocaleResource.Value: Show working hours deadline, start and end working hour in UTC and working week days on New Ticket page

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.ShowDeadlineWorkingHoursAndWorkingDayOnNewTicketsPage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify whether the working hours deadline, start and end working hour in UTC and working week days will be shown at top of the New Ticket page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.WorkingWeekDays.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify which days will be consider as working days ( This will be used when calculating the due in working hours ).

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.WorkingStartHour.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify which hour will be consider as a start working hour( This will be used when calculating the due in working hours ).

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.WorkingEndHour.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify which hour will be consider as a end working hour( This will be used when calculating the due in working hours ).

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.PreviewAttachmentsInBrowser.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose whether you want to preview the attachments in the browser or directly download them.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.DefaultSelectedStatus.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify which will be the default selected status

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.CloseAutomaticallyAfterXDays.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify how many days after the last reply the tickets will be closed automatically.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.WidgetZone.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The widget zone where the help desk will appear in the account navigation menu.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.DefaultEmailAccount.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The email account from which the emails are going to be sent.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.MinimumProductSearchKeywordLength.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The minimum length of the searched keyword before the product multiselect autocomplete is triggered.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.MaximumSizeOfFileToAttach
LocaleResource.Value: Maximum size of file to attach

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.MaximumSizeOfFileToAttach.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The maximum size of file to attach when submitting a ticket. Note: If the value of this setting is larger than 4 you should increase the maxRequestLenght value in your WebConfig.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.MaximumSizeOfFileToAttach.Warning
LocaleResource.Value: Please enter a value that is greater than 0.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.MaximumSizeOfFileToAttach.HigherThanMaximumRequestLength.Warning
LocaleResource.Value: The Maximum Size Of File To Attach setting exceeds the maxRequestLength property in your Web.Config. This may cause errors when an user tries to upload a larger file. Please, follow the link below for more information about this issue and how to fix it: https://www.nop-templates.com/increasing-the-maxrequestlength

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.MaximumSizeOfTheAttachedFiles
LocaleResource.Value: Maximum size of the attached files

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.MaximumSizeOfTheAttachedFiles.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The maximum size of all the attached files when submitting a ticket. Note: If the value of this setting is larger than 4 you should increase the maxRequestLenght value in your WebConfig.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.MaximumSizeOfTheAttachedFiles.Warning
LocaleResource.Value: Please enter a value that is greater than 0.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.MaximumSizeOfTheAttachedFiles.HigherThanMaximumSizeOfTheAttachedFiles.Warning
LocaleResource.Value: The Maximum size of file to attach setting value should not be greater than the Maximum size of the attached files setting value.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.IsProductFieldRequired.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify if the product field is required.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.MaxTicketProducts.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify how many products the user will be able to choose from the multi select control.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.SendEmailOnSubmitTicket.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify whether an email will be send to the customer when a ticket is submitted.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.SendEmailToStoreOwnerOnSubmitTicket
LocaleResource.Value: Send Email To Store Owner On Submit Ticket

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.SendEmailToStoreOwnerOnSubmitTicket.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify whether an email will be send to the store owner (ticket department) when a ticket is submitted

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.SendEmailToTicketAssignee
LocaleResource.Value: Send Email To Ticket Assignee (when a ticket is assigned)

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.SendEmailToTicketAssignee.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify whether an email will be send to the ticket assignee when a ticket is assigned.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.SendEmailOnReply.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify whether an email will be send when a ticket is answered.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.SendEmailOnClosingTicketAutomatically
LocaleResource.Value: Send Email On Closing Ticket Automatically

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.SendEmailOnClosingTicketAutomatically.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify whether an email will be send when a ticket is closed automatically by the system(scheduled task).

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.ProductPageWidgetZone.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The widget zone where the help desk button will appear on product details page. "None" means that the button won't be visible.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.OrderPageWidgetZone.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The widget zone where the help desk button will appear on order details page. "None" means that the button won't be visible.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.HelpDesk.Admin.Settings.Error.WorkingDays
LocaleResource.Value: You must enter at least one working day!

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.ContentManagement.Messagetemplates.Description.HelpDesk.Customer.NewTicketSubmittedNotification
LocaleResource.Value: This message template is used when a new ticket is submitted in the Help Desk ticketing system. The message is received by the customer who send the ticket. You can set up this option by ticking the checkbox Send Email On Submit Ticket in Nop-Templates - Plugins - Help Desk - Settings.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.ContentManagement.MessageTemplates.Description.HelpDesk.Customer.TicketClosedAutomaticallyNotification
LocaleResource.Value: This message template is used when a ticket has been closed automatically. The message is received by the customer who send the ticket. You can set up this option by ticking the checkbox Send Email On Closing Ticket Automatically in Nop-Templates - Plugins - Help Desk - Settings.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.ContentManagement.MessageTemplates.Description.HelpDesk.Customer.TicketReplyNotification
LocaleResource.Value: This message template is used when a ticket has been answered by the support team. The message is received by the customer who send the ticket. You can set up this option by ticking the checkbox Send Email On Reply in Nop-Templates - Plugins - Help Desk - Settings.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.ContentManagement.MessageTemplates.Description.HelpDesk.StoreOwner.NewTicketSubmittedNotification
LocaleResource.Value: This message template is used when a new ticket is submitted in the Help Desk ticketing system. The message is received by a store owner. You can set up this option by ticking the checkbox Send Email To Store Owner On Submit Ticket in Nop-Templates - Plugins - Help Desk - Settings.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.ContentManagement.MessageTemplates.Description.HelpDesk.StoreOwner.TicketAssignedNotification
LocaleResource.Value: This message template is used when a ticket has been assigned to a staff member. The message is received by the staff member. You can set up this option by ticking the checkbox Send Email To Ticket Assignee (when a ticket is assigned) in Nop-Templates - Plugins - Help Desk - Settings.
